roleset.name: start
roleset.note: BEGIN-V NOTES: Member of VNcls begin-55.1-1. This roleset is for nominal objects only -- not actions represented by clausal complements! So your arg1 should NOT be an S-node with this roleset. Rather, it will likely be an NP. (from begin.01-v)
BEGINNING-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb begin.01, OntoNotes grouping beginning-n senses 1, 2,& 4; maps to VN class begin-55.1-1. (from beginning.01-n)

role.descr: subevent or thing that Arg1 begins with

example.name: a little nicer
example.text: [The storm]-1 began *-1 to cause great destruction

example.name: transitive-with
example.text: John began the book with a murder

example.name: transitive-by
example.text: John began the book by describing a murder

example.name: with manner
example.text: John began the book with glee

example.name: ergative
example.text: The book began with a murder

example.name: NP only, Arg 1
example.text: the beginning of a six-day motor expedition from Oxfordshire toCornwall
example.arg: of a six-day motor expedition from Oxfordshire to Cornwall

example.name: Arg 1 as possessor
example.text: The war's beginning took everyone by surprise.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Children of wealthier families had, and still have, the option of postponing their beginning of adult responsibilities and continuing their studies.
